name: zig-bsdiff
description: Fast binary diff/patch implementation in Zig with zstd compression
author: Blackboard Technologies Inc.

scripts.dev: bun run setup && bun run build && bun run zig-test && bun run test
scripts.push:beta: bun version prerelease --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:patch: bun version prepatch --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:minor: bun version preminor --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:major: bun version premajor --preid=beta && git push origin main --tags
scripts.push:stable: bun version patch && git push origin main --tags
